General.Name: Plurilock Security Inc
General.Description: Plurilock Security Inc. operates an identity-centric cybersecurity company in the United States and Canada. The company operates in two divisions, Technology and Solutions. It offers Plurilock DEFEND, an enterprise continuous authentication platform that confirms user identity or alerts security teams to detected intrusions in real time; and Plurilock ADAPT, a standards-based login MFA platform, which provides added login security without relying on fingerprint scans, SMS codes, authenticator apps, hardware tokens, or other intrusive legacy MFA requirements. The company also offers services and resells IT and cybersecurity industry products and technologies. It serves financial services, healthcare, critical infrastructure, and government and military industries. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: MNP Tower, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 0C3

1.Name: Mr. Roland C. Sartorius CPA, CGA
